front.title: Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) with Graceful Restart

abstract.t: This document proposes an extension for Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) to support Graceful Restart, in complementing Graceful Restart support of the underlying protocol.This would work consistently, irrespective of the bfd mode or protocol or the type of restart and, most importantly, the vendors design and implementation. This document describes in detail the challenges to BFD in surviving a graceful restart, and a generic solution to such challenges.
